data.title: D. Fernando I & Leonor Telles - Matosinhos, Portugal - Monarchs of the World on Waymarking.com
data.meta_description: Waymarking.com is a way to mark unique locations on the planet and give them a voice. While GPS technology allows us to pinpoint any location on the planet, mark the location, and share it with others, Waymarking is the toolset for categorizing and adding unique information for that location.
data.text:
View waymark gallery

D. Fernando I & Leonor Telles - Matosinhos, Portugal

Posted by: razalas

N 41° 12.589 W 008° 37.450

29T E 531507 N 4562117

D. Fernando I King of Portugal,with his wife Leonor Telles.

Waymark Code: WMB4ZQ

Location: Porto, Portugal

Views: 5

[ENG]

Ferdinand I (Lisbon, 31 October 1345 – 22 October 1383 in Lisbon), was the ninth King of Portugal and the Algarve, the second (but eldest surviving) son of Peter I and his wife, Constance of Castile. He succeeded his father in 1367.

Fernando married Leonor Telles (or Teles) de Menezes, formerly the wife of the late nobleman João Lourenço da Cunha, Lord of Pombeiro, and daughter of Martin Alfonso Telles de Menezes (Martim Afonso Teles de Menezes). She gave him two sons who both died young, and one daughter. (visit link)

On plaque can be read:

"Municipality of Matosinhos

At 18 days of May in the year 1372 was celebrated,

in the Monastery of Santa Maria de Leca

the marriage of D. Ferdinand I, King of Portugal,

with Leonor Telles

Tribute to the sculptor Irene Vilar

(1930 - 2008)

Inauguration of his last work

the mayor

Dr. Guilherme Pinto

Desembre 14, 2008"

[PT]

D. Fernando I de Portugal, nono rei de Portugal, (Lisboa, 31 de Outubro de 1345 - 22 de Outubro de 1383). Era filho do rei D. Pedro I de Portugal e sua mulher, a princesa D. Constança de Castela. D. Fernando sucedeu a seu pai em 1367.

Na placa pode-se ler:

"Municipio de Matosinhos

Aos 18 dias do mês de Maio do ano de 1372 celebrou-se,

neste Mosteiro de Santa Maria de Leça

o matrimónio de D. Fernando I, Rei de Portugal,

com Dona Leonor Telles

Homenagem à escultora Irene Vilar

(1930 - 2008)

Inauguração da sua ultima obra

o presidente da câmara

Dr. Guilherme Pinto

14 Desembro de 2008"

Monarch Ranking: King / QueenProper Title and Name of Monarch: D. Fernando I Rei de PortugalCountry or Empire of Influence: PortugalWebsite for additonal information: [Web Link]

Visit Instructions:

Waymark Visitor - Must either

Provide a photo at the Statue

Answer a related question, if available, as posted on the Waymark description to the satistfaction of the Owner
